content: Dr. Dobson Tells Christians to Get Kids Out of California Public Schools

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font p span
content: On March 28, 2002, Focus on the Family founder, James C. Dobson, PhD, stated on his daily radio broadcast: "In the state of California, if I had a child there, I wouldn't put the youngster in a public school.... I think it's time to get our kids out. And I'm going to get hit for [saying] that."
